entry.title: WIND WARNING , Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:03 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pincher Creek Airport 02:50 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: W 46 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 110 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 9:20 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 9:20 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
